Uses of Interface
camzup.pfriendly.IYup2

Packages that use IYup2 
Package Description
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of IYup2 in camzup.pfriendly

    Classes in camzup.pfriendly that implement IYup2 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Yup2
    A 2.5D renderer based on OpenGL.
    class  YupJ2
    A 2D renderer based on the Java AWT (Abstract Window Toolkit).
    Methods in camzup.pfriendly with parameters of type IYup2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec2 IYup2.mouse​(processing.core.PApplet parent, IYup2 renderer, Vec2 target)
    Finds the mouse's location in world coordinates relative to the renderer's camera.
    static java.lang.String IYup2.svgBackground​(IYup2 renderer)
    Generates an SVG rectangle element to replicate the renderer's background.
    static java.lang.String IYup2.svgCamera​(IYup2 renderer)
    Generates an SVG transform as a string from the renderer's dimensions, camera zoom, camera rotation and camera location.
    static java.lang.String IYup2.svgHeader​(IYup2 renderer)
    Generates the boilerplate at the top of an SVG as a String based on the renderer's information.
    static java.lang.String IYup2.toSvgString​(IYup2 renderer, CurveEntity2[] ces, MaterialSolid[] mats)
    Generates an SVG string from several 2D curve entities.
    static java.lang.String IYup2.toSvgString​(IYup2 renderer, MeshEntity2[] mes, MaterialSolid[] mats)
    Generates an SVG string from several 2D mesh entities.
